tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My child was suffering from  fever and also had  pain in his eyes and ears ,we were bit worried as what has happened to our child but thanks to Dr HC Bhatt  for finding out at physical  examination only that  what is the real issue and that too without any test (as that would have been an added expense for us and would have taken more time in starting the right medicine)it was only possible because of his rich experience and knowledge.I am thankful to him for all his support as my experience was phenomenal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We went for vaccinations of my newborn.Doc was to the point ,he decluttered the various doubt regarding type n price of vaccine,,We had  lots of info Regarding vaccines from friends ,google and other docs and were highly confused which to give n why .
The Doc easily explains u the pros n cons of a particular vaccine which gave us a lot of confidence and now 18 months with him ,We both easily can say he‚Äôs professionally competent and  we came to know that he has published so many news article on vaccine ,corona virus etc in various news papers.
We recommended him to our fellow lawyers they ended with same happy feed back .
reply_text:
I do remember you both young lawyers ,happy to know that u have penned down your feelings too ,u r coming to for regular vaccinations n other pediatric issues .Your appreciation means a lot .
Thx n stay blessed the whole family .
